p: About 80Â % of fecal adenoviruses present in faeces of patients with acute gastroenteritis are caused by enteric adenovirus AD 40 and 41, but other serotypes have also been reported to cause gastroenteritis, like Ad9 and Ad10, and were found in Dhaka city, Bangladesh Dey et al. 2009; Ad2, Ad3, Ad8, and Ad31 were found in Japan, Korea, and Vietnam (Li et al. 2005).
